scripts.publish: VERSION=`node -e 'console.log(require("./package.json").version)'` && cp build/mapv.js build/release/mapv.v${VERSION}.js && uglifyjs build/release/mapv.v${VERSION}.js -c drop_console -m -o build/release/mapv.v${VERSION}.min.js
scripts.mini: npm run build && uglifyjs build/mapv.js -c -m -o build/mapv.min.js
scripts.build: mkdir -p build && mkdir -p build/release && node -e 'process.stdout.write("export var version = \"" + require("./package.json").version + "\";\n");' > build/version.js && rollup -c
